=String Formatting=
!WinBuilder has the following string formatting capabilities :

 * [strformatBYTES BYTES]
 * [strformatCEIL [CEIL / FLOOR] 
 * [strformatCHARTOOEM [CHARTOOEM / OEMTOCHAR] ]
 * [strformatDATE DATE]
 * [strformatFILENAME FILENAME / PATH / EXT] 
 * [strformatINC INC / DEC / MULT / DIV]
 * [strformatLEFT LEFT / RIGHT]
 * [strformatLEN LEN]
 * [strformatLTRIM LTRIM / RTRIM / CTRIM / NTRIM] 
 * [strformatPOS POS]
 * [strformatREPLACE REPLACE / REPLACEX]
 * [strformatSHORTPATH SHORTPATH / LONGPATH]
 * [strformatSPLIT SPLIT]
